channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Insights Foundation for Energy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Insights Foundation for Energy

item.title: CVE-2017-1342|2024-08-05T13:32:29.354Z -- ibm -- insights%20foundation%20for%20energy
item.description: IBM Insights Foundation for Energy 2.0 could reveal sensitive information in error messages to authenticated users that could e used to conduct further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 126457.

item.title: CVE-2017-1311|2024-08-05T13:32:28.529Z -- ibm -- insights%20foundation%20for%20energy
item.description: IBM Insights Foundation for Energy 2.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 125719.

item.title: CVE-2017-1345|2024-08-05T13:32:29.329Z -- ibm -- insights%20foundation%20for%20energy
item.description: IBM Insights Foundation for Energy 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 126460.
